reviews.review: Terrible game with dog shit servers and a barely functioning anti-cheat that can't even ban people spinning at 600 RPM instantly killing anyone in view

Yo. I'm in my mid thirties and I have been playing Counter Strike since version 1.3.
I haven't played much Global Offensive. I stopped playing huge amount of time after Counter-Strike source came out. It's sad steam hasn't registered the amount of time I played this damn game. That option was available back then. In those times, I put my life into the game. I was very good. Now, I suck. Big time. 

Even if I suck, I recommend Global Offensive, to new players and old dude like myself.

Peace my friends, and may the force be with you.
